show_name: Bungaku Shōjo: Kyō no Oyatsu - Hatsukoi (OAV)
other_title: “文学少女”今日のおやつ 〜はつ恋〜 (Japanese)
plot: Tōko Amano and Konoha Inoue are the sole members of their literary club. After school, they meet so that Tōko can assign topics which will guide Konoha in writing a short story within fifty minutes.
